name: bitmutex-strapi-next-app
description: Strapi5 NextJs15 App built to use as website for Bitmutex Technologies

scripts.setup:client: cd client && pnpm install && node --import tsx ../copy-env.mts ./
scripts.setup:server: cd server && pnpm install && node --import tsx ../copy-env.mts ./
scripts.spawn: pnpm setup:client && pnpm setup:server && pnpm setup:root
scripts.dev: pnpm concurrently "cd server && pnpm develop" "npx wait-on http://localhost:1337 && cd client && pnpm dev"
scripts.build: pnpm concurrently --kill-others "cd server && pnpm build && pnpm start" "npx wait-on http://localhost:1337 && cd client && pnpm build && echo 'Build Successful!' && exit 0 || echo ' Build Failed!' && exit 1"
scripts.start: pnpm concurrently "cd server && pnpm start" "npx wait-on http://localhost:1337 && cd client && pnpm start"
scripts.repo:upstream: git fetch upstream && git merge upstream/main
